_sText:
--- ba_jail_hussa_v1 ---

- Created by Slasher/Hussa.

This Map's based on 2 'rooms'.

The Main Room (huge): It contains:
-Cells (T-Spawn)
-CT Spawn
-Pool
-Watchtower
-Race
-Football
-Massjail
-Healroom

It also includes 2 Shafts, 2 USP's in 2 different Cells, 1 at the Pool.

The secondary Room: It contains mainly a disco, a healroom, a Shooting Range, a killing room (rotating Blades).

It also includes an USP in the healroom.

________________________


In the Map was put a secret, well, only 2 guys know how to open it, and nobody will know it in further.
It's just a room where the one who opened it can kill all by spawning props.
So it's not usefull for jail.
It just was made for the lulz. (:

Special Thanks for Fannboii for testing it on his Jail Server (only German):
83.169.44.129:27015

Youre welcome to visit us, if you are german. :P

Also thanks to KILLERWHALEOWNEDYOU for his Shooting Range Prefab which you can find here: http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/5259

________________________

WARNING: This map is as much optimazed as it was possible to do for me.
But this doesn't mean you got high FPS everywhere, you really don't.
If ur at the end of the pool and look onto the whole main room, you get fps like 20-30. Not more.
This shouldn't effect the gameplay but it's not nice though.

Further Versions will come where i'm going to higher the FPS, trying different ways.

________________________

If your' going to use this Map on ur server, it would be nice if you'd inform me.
I'd like to visit the Server when the Map is on and hear what players are going to say about it/getting ideas for improvements, i'm always open for suggestions.

So that's it till now, i hope you enjoy.
You may rate and comment here. (:

Peace out,

Slasher.
